channel.description: I included a whole bunch of religions I got from Wikipedia. Because I accidentally forgot other(none of the above), I put it at the bottom. item.title: By looking at Chimaera God's post about evolution or religionIthoughtofsometing
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

[quote=“Heaven, post:25, topic:138727”]Personally, whoever made the bible, was some guy who decided to write a big LONG story.
Scientists have discovered that we MAY have evolved from apes, well they did a long time ago anyways - & the bible says god created us, well atleast the one I have.
So basically, all religions are FALSE[/quote]
Have you ever considered the fact that scientists may be wrong?
As for your opinion of the bible’s author: please actually do some research before you make a claim like that. Non-Christian historians agree with a lot of the historical content of the bible, and for your information, it was written over thousands of years by a variety of people.

Read full topic

item.title: By looking at Chimaera God's post about evolution or religionIthoughtofsometing
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

In early history, religions were mainly created to control the common people. It does make sense. For example, if we were all to believe in one and only god or higher power, we would all be easier to control because we would all accept the rules, laws, and other things that that religion would present.

In correspondence to your post Heaven, you are correct. Religions are false and they were only thought up so the government could have better control of its citizens.

Read full topic
